CustomField.description: Field used to convert the total dollar amount from dollars to text
CustomField.formula: IF(FIND('.', TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c)) = 0, TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c) + '.00', (LEFT(TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c), FIND('.', TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c) ) ) ) + RPAD(RIGHT(TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c), LEN(TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c)) - FIND('.', TEXT(Total_Dollar_Amount__c) ) ), 2, '0') )
CustomField.label: Total Amount TXT
